about_the_game:
FREE +18 DLC for game GOLD girls
It contains addinational 33 images for your base game, enjoy high quality artworks.
Some of the images may include mature content.

content_descriptors.notes:
The puzzle images featuring nudity and sexual content. May not be suitable for all viewers.
All characters depicted in the game are above the age of 21.

detailed_description:
FREE +18 DLC for game GOLD girls
It contains addinational 33 images for your base game, enjoy high quality artworks.

name: GOLD girls - Free 18+ DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything with DirectX 10.0
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
